title: From root to result: Portable NIRS-based non-destructive prediction of cassava quality traits
description: Cassava (Manihot esculenta Crantz) is a staple food and a key industrial crop across tropical regions, but traditional phenotyping for critical quality traits like dry matter content (DMC) and starch content (StC) is a laborious and low-throughput process. Th…
